name: Parametric Weather Insurance
description: Insurance products that automatically pay out based on predefined weather parameters, reducing claims processing time and costs.

name: AI Claims Processing
description: AI-powered solutions that streamline claims processing, reducing adjustment time and improving accuracy.

name: Cyber Risk Assessment
description: Advanced tools to accurately assess and price cyber risk exposure for businesses.

name: Microinsurance Platforms
description: Platforms enabling small-ticket insurance products for underserved segments or specific risk events.

name: Commercial Drone Insurance
description: Specialized coverage for commercial drone operations, including liability and equipment damage.

name: Blockchain Claims Verification
description: Blockchain-based systems for transparent, immutable claims verification and processing.

name: IoT Commercial Property Monitoring
description: IoT sensors and systems for real-time monitoring of commercial properties to prevent and mitigate losses.

name: API-Driven Embedded Insurance
description: API infrastructure enabling third-party platforms to embed insurance products within their customer journeys.

name: Autonomous Vehicle Coverage
description: Specialized coverage models for autonomous and semi-autonomous vehicles addressing new liability scenarios.

name: Climate Risk Modeling
description: Advanced climate models that predict and price climate-related risks for property insurance.

name: On-Demand Professional Liability
description: Time-based professional liability coverage activated only when needed for gig workers and consultants.

name: Digital Policy Management
description: Digital platforms for businesses to manage all their insurance policies in one place with analytics and optimization.

name: Peer-to-Peer Commercial Insurance
description: Risk pooling platforms where similar businesses share risk among themselves with insurance backing.

name: Predictive Analytics for Underwriting
description: AI-powered predictive models that enhance risk selection and pricing accuracy in hard-to-place risks.

name: Construction Risk Management Platform
description: Integrated platforms that monitor construction projects and provide real-time risk insights and mitigation strategies.

name: Supply Chain Risk Insurance
description: Insurance products covering disruptions in global supply chains with real-time monitoring and preventive alerts.

name: Behavioral Premium Pricing
description: Premium pricing models based on actual workplace behaviors and safety practices monitored through IoT.

name: Digital Insurance Marketplace
description: Digital marketplaces connecting excess and surplus carriers with brokers and businesses seeking coverage.

name: Parametric Business Interruption
description: Business interruption coverage with automatic payouts based on predefined triggers instead of calculated losses.

name: AI-Powered Risk Assessment
description: AI systems that analyze diverse data sources to assess complex risks that traditional models struggle with.
